text: The 2019–20 season will be the 90th season of competitive football by Petrolul Ploiești, and the 2nd in Liga II after an absence of 7 years, finishing fourth in the previous year. Petrolul Ploiești will compete in the Liga II and in Cupa României. The season covers the period from 1 July 2019 to 30 June 2020. ==Previous season positions== {| class="wikitable" |- ! ! Competition !
